subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball (College)
Historic Buildings and Sites
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The intimate atmosphere of the 89-year-old Rose Hill Gym may be undeniable, but some Fordham fans say that it is hampering basketball recruiting.
snippet: The intimate atmosphere of the 89-year-old Rose Hill Gym may be undeniable, but some Fordham fans say that it is hampering basketball recruiting.
